data.title: Avengers
data.statement:
You must help Nick choose the best avenger to defeat the intergalactic enemy. The superhero must be the least powerful [[Q]] among avengers who has more power than the enemy [[P]].

If no avenger can defeat the enemy, write {{IMPOSSIBLE}}. If several heroes are tied, the first in alphabetical order is selected.
data.stubGenerator:
read P:int
read N:int
loop N read S:word(20) Q:int
write answer
data.inputDescription:
<<Line 1 : >> An integer [[P]] for the power of the enemy
<<Line 2 : >> An integer [[N]] for the number of avengers
<<Next [[N]] lines: >>  A string [[S]] for the name and an integer [[Q]] for the power of each avenger, separated by a space
data.outputDescription: A string [[A]] for the name of the best avenger

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You must help Nick choose the best avenger to defeat the intergalactic enemy. The superhero must be the least powerful Q among avengers who has more power than the enemy P.

If no avenger can defeat the enemy, write IMPOSSIBLE. If several heroes are tied, the first in alphabetical order is selected.
Input
Line 1 : An integer P for the power of the enemy
Line 2 : An integer N for the number of avengers
Next N lines: A string S for the name and an integer Q for the power of each avenger, separated by a space
Output
A string A for the name of the best avenger
Constraints
0 < N < 20
0 < P, Q < 100
Example
Input
10
4
IRONMAN 50
THOR 12
HULK 16
CAPTAINAMERICA 5
Output
THOR
